metadata.title: sprunki.to
metadata.description: Experience the mind-bending world of music mixing with sprunki. A surreal musical journey into digital creativity and fun beats.
metadata.keywords: sprunki, Music Mixer, Digital Art, Experimental Music, Beat Making, sprunki.to

hero.title: Welcome to sprunki.to
hero.description: Dive into a creative digital realm where music meets fun

items.title: What is sprunki?
items.description: sprunki is an engaging musical experience that combines fun characters with interactive sound creation. It's a unique platform where players can create music through interactive interfaces and creative visuals.

items.title: What makes sprunki special?
items.description: sprunki takes the music mixing experience and enhances it with quirky characters, fun visuals, and engaging gameplay elements. It creates a unique blend of digital creativity and musical experimentation.

items.title: How do I play?
items.description: Simply click 'Play Now' to begin. You'll be able to interact with various glitched characters, each producing unique sounds. Combine these elements to create your own haunting musical compositions.

items.title: Is it free to play?
items.description: Yes, sprunki is free to play directly in your web browser. No downloads or installations required.

brand.title: sprunki
brand.description: A journey into musical creativity and fun

children.title: Who made the sounds for sprunki?
